org.sql: SELECT spree_products_taxons.* FROM spree_products_taxons WHERE spree_products_taxons.taxon_id = "$1" AND spree_products_taxons.product_id = "$2" ORDER BY spree_products_taxons.position ASC

rewrites.sql: SELECT spree_products_taxons.* FROM spree_products_taxons WHERE spree_products_taxons.taxon_id = "$1" AND spree_products_taxons.product_id = "$2" ORDER BY spree_products_taxons.position ASC LIMIT 1
